speech.name: rejection
lines: I don't think my friendship nipple can take this.
You're missing out, I have CLAWS.

speech.name: mirror
lines: Wow, I was not expecting this.

speech.name: npc
lines: I was born with six fingers, and I had one of them surgically removed.
I didn't wear pants all day today. You're seeing something new.
Well, I guess I can’t play violin anymore. Charles broke my E string.
Perkins doesn't have real toilet paper.
Dude, we should go to Jo's!! But we're already at Jo's!!.

speech.name: perkinite_JT
lines: I don't do this newfangled electronic mail thing.
My email got hacked. It's not my faultttttttttttt.

speech.name: perkinite_RB
lines: Where the f**k is the string cheese??
